items.name: Margherita Pizza
items.description: Classic pizza with tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and fresh basil.

items.name: Biryani
items.description: Aromatic basmati rice cooked with spices, meat, and saffron.

items.name: Burger
items.description: Juicy beef patty with lettuce, tomato, cheese, and special sauce.

items.name: Dosa
items.description: Crispy fermented crepe made from rice batter and black lentils.

items.name: Paneer Tikka
items.description: Marinated paneer cubes grilled to perfection with spices.

items.name: Chicken Curry
items.description: Spicy and flavorful chicken curry with rich spices and coconut milk.

items.name: Caesar Salad
items.description: Fresh romaine lettuce with Caesar dressing, croutons, and parmesan cheese.

items.name: Pasta Alfredo
items.description: Creamy fettuccine pasta with Alfredo sauce and grilled chicken.

items.name: Vanilla Ice Cream
items.description: Smooth and creamy vanilla ice cream topped with chocolate sauce.

items.name: Sushi Rolls
items.description: Fresh sushi rolls with salmon, avocado, and cucumber.

items.name: Tacos
items.description: Spicy tacos with salsa, cheese, and lettuce.
